content.text:
# Draft:Brainware College of Professional Studies

Brainware College of Professional Studies is a Private Institution, established in 2011, located in Kolkata, West Bengal. It is Affiliated College of the West Bengal State University.
History
It is part of Brainware University, offers a variety of undergraduate and postgraduate courses in fields like IT and Software, Engineering and Architecture, Business and Management, Marketing, and Health and Fitness.
Courses
IT And Software
* Computer Application
* Computer science
* Master of Computer Applications
* Diploma in CSE, Robotics & Automation.
Engineering & Architecture
* BBA
* MBA
* BBA LLB
* B.COM
Health & Fitness
* B.Sc. in Nursing
* B.Pharmacy
* Paramedical
* Biotechnology
* Multimedia and Animation
* Agriculture
* Allied Health Sciences
